title: Born, Madly
description: From USA Today best-selling author Trisha Wolfe comes her most dark and dangerous romance psych thriller that readers say "deliciously twisted" a performance by two.But who is acting, and who is devolving?A buried past is unearthed, and Grayson Sullivan--AKA The Angel of Maine--retaliates against the system who made him, deploying psychological warfare on the woman who initially set him free. Dr. London Noble probes deep into the mind of the killer she's fallen for, searching for answers, as a copycat killer threatens their unity. Are they partners, lovers, or enemies? One final trap will reveal all.* Find a complete list of content information on the author's website
author: Trisha Wolfe
